participant_1.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.

participant_2.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i just got a job working in a gas station. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i am terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.
